item.title: Alleycats
item.description: A short film looking at the counter-culture of the underground alleycat bike courier races in the face of commercial companies hijacking the scene. The film will be shot in London, New York, Tokyo and Barcelona.

item.title: The Bunker Research Project
item.description: An ongoing series of short-films riding to the World War II bunkers in the Alps, explored in the 1960’s by the Rough Stuff Fellowship and documented on the Bunker Research site and accompanying book.

item.title: Berlin to Auschwitz
item.description: A short-film riding approximately 600km in the cold, wet and dark winter months along (or as close to) the rail route that the Nazis took the Jews to Auschwitz.

item.title: Girona, Spain
item.description: A photo-gallery of three days riding out of the old town. Both gravel and road including a run to the coast, the famous climbs of Els Angels and Rocacorba.

item.title: The Tuscany Trail, Italy
item.description: A photo-gallery riding a gravel route on the famous Strade Bianchi across the countryside of Tuscany. Approximately 600km ridden at a “coffee ride” pace over four or five days with 3,000 other bike-packers.
